title: Got an lpq even when I didn't dodge and I banned, and then got another one after that because the
body: client bugged out after clicking on the runes thing in champ select? wtf, is it possible to get my ban removed? this was none of my fault and totally out of my control!

replies.body: I clicked on the new runes and clicked on the pencil and my client froze and I couldn't click anything, resulting in me not banning and getting kicked!!!!!!!!
